TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RenderOptions extends System.Object
public ref class RenderOptions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用來控制物件轉譯行為的選項。

span.span: Provides options for controlling the rendering behavior of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用的附加的屬性類別在 WPF 應用程式中指定的文字和視覺項目呈現的選項。You can use the attached properties of the class to specify options for the rendering of text and visual elements in your WPF application. 這些選項可讓您最佳化速度或畫質的呈現方式。These options enable you to optimize rendering for speed or quality.

related.span: WPF 的程式碼剖析工具的效能

span.span: Performance Profiling Tools for WPF

summary.span: 取得或設定所指定 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用上的屬性或動畫點陣圖的子系。Use the property on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 建立任何點陣圖的比例動畫時，預設的高品質影像重新取樣演算法有時會耗用過多系統資源，導致畫面播放速率降低，從而造成動畫中斷。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 藉由設定屬性設，縮放點陣圖時，您可以建立更順暢的動畫。By setting the property to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. 若要存取此屬性在程式碼中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty BitmapScalingModeProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly BitmapScalingModeProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定所指定 的最大快取失效臨界值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache invalidation threshold maximum value for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的屬性受和其衍生的類型。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它要搭配，具有中繼介面，例如筆刷和。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 它只會有作用時屬性設定為。It only has an effect when the property is set to . 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不會快取的呈現的內容和物件。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在靜態案例中，其中內容和場景中的筆刷使用都不會變更，未快取內容十分有用，因為它可以節省視訊記憶體。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching the content provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 當具有靜態內容的筆刷會在非靜態方法的預設行為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新轉譯的筆刷的所有內容都是每個畫面，即使內容不變亦同。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，將會發生此靜態或旋轉 3D 物件的介面對應。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新轉譯靜態內容會對效能產生負面影響。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 藉由設定附加屬性的筆刷，您可以使用並排筆刷物件的快取的版本，以提升效能。By setting the attached property on the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 並屬性的值是相對大小值，判斷何時應該重新產生物件，因為擴展的變更。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，當屬性設為 2.0 時，快取必須其大小超過目前快取大小兩倍時，才重新產生。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 若要存取此屬性在程式碼中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的快取提示選項。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-xml[RenderOptions#CachingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml#cachingxaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty CacheInvalidationThresholdMaximumProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly CacheInvalidationThresholdMaximumProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定所指定 的最小快取失效臨界值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache invalidation threshold minimum value for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的屬性受和其衍生的類型。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它要搭配，具有中繼介面，例如筆刷和。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 它只會有作用時屬性設定為。It only has an effect when the property is set to . 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不會快取的呈現的內容和物件。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在靜態案例中，其中內容和場景中的筆刷使用都不會變更，未快取內容十分有用，因為它可以節省視訊記憶體。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching the content provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 當具有靜態內容的筆刷會在非靜態方法的預設行為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新轉譯的筆刷的所有內容都是每個畫面，即使內容不變亦同。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，將會發生此靜態或旋轉 3D 物件的介面對應。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新轉譯靜態內容會對效能產生負面影響。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 藉由設定附加屬性的筆刷，您可以使用並排筆刷物件的快取的版本，以提升效能。By setting the attached property on the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 並屬性的值是相對大小值，判斷何時應該重新產生物件，因為擴展的變更。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，當屬性設定為 0.5，快取重新產生它的大小縮減為目前的快取的大小小於一半時，才需要。For example, when the property is set to 0.5, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size is reduced to less than one half the size of the current cache. 若要存取此屬性在程式碼中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的快取提示選項。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-xml[RenderOptions#CachingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml#cachingxaml)]

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值指出如果可能應該快取呈現的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that rendered content should be cached when possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的屬性受和其衍生的類型。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它要搭配，具有中繼介面，例如筆刷和。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不會快取的呈現的內容和物件。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在靜態案例中，其中內容和場景中的筆刷使用都不會變更，快取的並非十分有用，因為它可以節省視訊記憶體。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 當具有靜態內容的筆刷會在非靜態方法的預設行為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新轉譯的筆刷的所有內容都是每個畫面，即使內容不變亦同。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，將會發生此靜態或旋轉 3D 物件的介面對應。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新轉譯靜態內容會對效能產生負面影響。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 藉由設定附加屬性的筆刷，您可以使用並排筆刷物件的快取的版本，以提升效能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 並屬性的值是相對大小值，判斷何時應該重新產生物件，因為擴展的變更。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，當屬性設為 2.0 時，快取必須其大小超過目前快取大小兩倍時，才重新產生。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 若要存取此屬性在程式碼中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的快取提示選項。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty CachingHintProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly CachingHintProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會通知轉譯引擎是否可使用 ClearType 來呈現文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates to the rendering engine whether text can be rendered with ClearType.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用附加屬性來表示，可以使用特定的組件的視覺化樹狀結構中的 ClearType 呈現文字。Use the attached property to indicate that text can be rendered with ClearType in a specific part of the visual tree. ClearType 文字未正確顯示，不是完全不透明背景。ClearType text does not display correctly on a background that is not fully opaque. 中繼呈現目標，例如， ， ， ， ，和，可能會造成不是完全不透明的背景。Intermediate render targets, such as , , , , , and , can introduce backgrounds that are not fully opaque. 當它偵測到在其中繪製文字的緩衝區可能會有透明背景，則 WPF 會停用 ClearType。WPF disables ClearType when it detects that the buffer into which text is drawn could have a transparent background. 設定屬性設表示子樹狀結構是安全的 ClearType 文字轉譯。Set the property to to indicate that a subtree is safe for ClearType text rendering. 只可以是特定的文字會轉譯為完全不透明的背景時，才執行此動作。Do this only when you can be certain that the text is rendering to a fully opaque background. 當子樹狀結構中的項目導入了透明度時，您可以啟用 ClearType;不過，可能會發生轉譯問題。When an element in the subtree introduces transparency, you can enable ClearType; however, rendering issues may occur. 如果子樹狀結構的一部分導入了更多中繼呈現目標，您必須設定再於該樹狀子目錄的子系。If a portion of the subtree introduces more intermediate rendering targets, you must set again on the children of that subtree. 下列清單將示範如何確定要使用 ClearType 呈現文字，會正確出現。The following list shows how to make sure that text to be rendered with ClearType appears correctly. - 不會導入之間的中繼呈現目標和要使用 ClearType 呈現文字。Do not introduce intermediate render targets between and the text to be rendered with ClearType. - 指派是盡可能接近視覺化樹狀結構中文字的不透明背景。Assign an opaque background that is as close as possible in the visual tree to the text. - 請注意，重新啟用 ClearType 子樹狀結構; 不過，不會強制 ClearType 呈現。Be aware that re-enables ClearType for a subtree; however, it does not force ClearType rendering. - 請注意，不會覆寫您的系統設定或設定。Be aware that does not override your system settings or settings. > [!NOTE] > 附加的屬性不會影響控制; 不過，它使用控制項。The attached property does not affect the control; however, it does work with the control. > [!NOTE] > 在許多控制項，附加的屬性沒有任何作用，除非您設定的文字後面的不透明背景。On many controls, the attached property has no effect unless you set an opaque background behind the text. 若要存取此屬性在程式碼中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何屬性會影響的視覺化樹狀結構的不同分支。The following example shows how the property affects different branches of the visual tree. 在第一個文字區塊控制項中，是在使用 ClearType 呈現文字因為文字區塊會繼承主視窗中的設定。In the first text block control, text is rendered with ClearType because the text block inherits the setting from the main window. 在第二個文字區塊中，ClearType 不使用，因為父元素的屬性設定。In the second text block, ClearType is not used because the parent element's property is set. 在第三個文字區塊中，使用，但可能會發生轉譯問題。In the third text block, is used, but rendering issues may occur. ```xaml ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty ClearTypeHintProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly ClearTypeHintProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定非文字基本的 列舉值，用以判斷它邊緣的轉譯方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration value for a non-text primitive that determines how its edges are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用附加屬性來改善藉由指定的視覺物件應該呈現與鋸齒邊緣的轉譯效能。Use the attached property to improve rendering performance by specifying that a visual object should be rendered with aliased edges. 文字物件一律會顯示使用消除鋸齒，而且並不會影響設定的邊緣模式值。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 當您設定的視覺物件的邊緣模式值時，視覺物件的所有子系繪圖基本會設定為相同的邊緣模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. 若要存取此屬性在程式碼中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty EdgeModeProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly EdgeModeProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 指定目前程序的呈現模式偏好設定。

span.span: Specifies the render mode preference for the current process.

value.span: 目前程序的 偏好設定。

span.span: The preference for the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以強制軟體呈現為目前的處理序。Use the property to force software rendering for the current process. 您可以避免許多轉譯問題的 WPF 應用程式中發生，且如果您變更您的喜好設定，為軟體轉譯，外部的問題所造成的。You can avoid many rendering issues that occur in WPF applications and that are caused by external issues if you change your preference to software rendering. 應用程式在啟動期間，如果您的應用程式偵測到的轉譯問題，例如緩慢的畫面播放速率，您可以設定的轉譯模式只軟體。During application startup, if your application detects rendering issues, such as slow frame rates, you can set the rendering mode to software only. 此外，您可能要啟用的使用者，設定應用程式執行時。Also, you may want to enable the user setting while the application is running. 喜好設定會覆寫設定。The preference overrides the setting. 軟體呈現的優先順序是：The precedence order for software rendering is: 1. DisableHWAcceleration 登錄機碼DisableHWAcceleration registry key 2. 3. （每個目標） (per-target) **附註**指定喜好設定，並一定不會變更實際的呈現模式。**Note** specifies a preference and does not necessarily change the actual rendering mode. 系統的其他部分可能會覆寫這個喜好設定，並強制系統進入軟體呈現。Other parts of the system may override this preference and force the system into software rendering.

span.span: to set this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法或動畫點陣圖的子系。Use the method on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 建立任何點陣圖的比例動畫時，預設的高品質影像重新取樣演算法有時會耗用過多系統資源，導致畫面播放速率降低，從而造成動畫中斷。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 藉由設定的屬性物件到，縮放點陣圖時，您可以建立更順暢的動畫。By setting the property of the object to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定針對物件。The following example shows how to set the for an object. [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet2)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet2)]

param.span: 要設定其 屬性值的相依性物件。

summary.span: 設定所指定相依性物件的 附加屬性值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property on a specified dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不會快取的呈現的內容和物件。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在靜態案例中，其中內容和場景中的筆刷使用都不會變更，快取的並非十分有用，因為它可以節省視訊記憶體。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 當具有靜態內容的筆刷會在非靜態方法的預設行為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新轉譯的筆刷的所有內容都是每個畫面，即使內容不變亦同。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，將會發生此靜態或旋轉 3D 物件的介面對應。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新轉譯靜態內容會對效能產生負面影響。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 藉由設定附加屬性的筆刷，您可以使用並排筆刷物件的快取的版本，以提升效能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 並屬性的值是相對大小值，判斷何時應該重新產生物件，因為擴展的變更。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，當屬性設為 2.0 時，快取必須其大小超過目前快取大小兩倍時，才重新產生。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 使用此方法來設定附加程式碼中的屬性。Use this method to set the attached property in code. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的快取提示選項。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet3)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字物件一律會顯示使用消除鋸齒，而且並不會影響設定的邊緣模式值。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 當您設定的視覺物件的邊緣模式值時，視覺物件的所有子系繪圖基本會設定為相同的邊緣模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來設定之視覺物件的邊緣模式。The following example shows how to use the method to set the edge mode for a visual object to . [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#setedgemode)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#setedgemode)]

span.span: The specified is .
